title: When people of Muslim heritage challenge fundamentalism
description: Karima Bennoune shares four powerful stories of real people fighting against fundamentalism in their own communities — refusing to allow the faith they love to become a tool for crime, attacks and murder. These personal stories humanize one of the most overlooked human-rights struggles in the world.
author: Karima Bennoune
keywords: TED, talks, history, religion, storytelling, terrorism, war
